clinker.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the hard material like rocks, which is left after coal has been burnt
clinker.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a bad note in a musical performance
clinker.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The singer hit a real clinker.
clinker.translation[0].definitions[2].de: something or someone that is a total failure
clinker.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Most of the songs are good, but there are a few clinkers.
